alert.note: Alert for Iron (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 02 at 5:12PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southern Utah, including the following county, Iron. * WHEN...Until 615 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 511 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen, with the heaviest rainfall over western portions of Cedar City. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Cedar City and Hamilton Fort.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
